description: This file contains CSS styles for a web application, specifically defining theme colors and styles for various components of the App.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container class for the application, manages layout and styles.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styles including layout, background color, and responsive features.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including hover and active states.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Animation keyframes for spinning the App logo.
